data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Gunma, Japan to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gunma, Japan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 11,406 believers in the state of Gunma.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Gunma, Japan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give your people in Gunma, Japan a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 11,406 believers in Gunma, Japan how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Gunma prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Gunma to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Gunma.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

location.name: Gunma
